name: TramSim Munich
storyline:
Discover a new city with numerous landmarks and the low-floor tram model R2.2.b in TramSim Munich!

Transport your passengers through the centre of the German capital of Bavaria with three detailed tram lines in full length. Historic buildings, squares and museums have been displayed close to reality and authentic AI traffic as well as dynamic passenger and pedestrian behaviour bring the city to life. Each of the three lines has another highlight: the line 23, for example, starts at the Münchner Freiheit and the line 27 is not only in use by day, but also at night.
summary: Discover a new city with numerous landmarks and the low-floor tram model R2.2.b in TramSim Munich! Transport your passengers through the centre of the German capital of Bavaria with three detailed tram lines in full length.
